div.style: padding: 1pt 0in; border-top-width: 1pt; border-style: solid none; border-right-width: initial; border-right-color: initial; border-bottom-width: 1pt; border-left-width: initial; border-left-color: initial;

em.span: for North Marion School District. Sign–up details below.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Schools in the North Marion School District may close due to severe weather, power outages, or other emergency events or student safety situations. Severe weather impacting transportation prompting a delay, a closure, or early release status will be posted as early as possible using (in this order) the

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: District Website home page. All staff and families are encouraged to subscribe.

g.class: gr_ gr_40 gr-alert gr_gramm gr_inline_cards gr_disable_anim_appear Punctuation only-del replaceWithoutSep

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Notifies the public of school emergencies, by feeding directly into local news stations, sending texts and email directly to the subscriber’s mobile phone (if signed-up), as soon as decision is made. In some cases we may make the decision, the night before, or as early as 4 am.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: SIGN UP to receive instant messaging for school delays, and closure alerts. Go to

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: . This link is specific to North Marion. To sign up for FlashAlert where you live, go to

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Sends audio message and email (5 am for staff; and 5:30 am for parents) directly to your primary phone in PowerSchool. To receive a SMS Text message, you must “Opt-in”.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: ---> OPT-IN: School messenger app gives you access to school notifications of all types in a single inbox. Text “YES to 67587 to Opt-in for messages from school. If you later decide to opt-out, you may reply “STOP” to any message from a school or the district.

span.style: background: rgb(79, 129, 189); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman";;background-color: rgb(215, 227, 188);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Principals post to their school and district website Facebook pages.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: A weather notification will scroll on the district home page as an “ALERT”.

font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
